import.label: Click here to choose a file to read

input.label: Document
input.hint: Please add Verifiable Credential or Presentation document text here

error.json: The provided document has broken or isn't a JSON
error.unknown: Unknwon document type. We can't process it.

file.binary: You uploaded a binary file. The system can't display it's content.

import.here: Drag & drop a file here or click for more options.

input.label: Text document content
input.hint: One can set document as a text here. JSON can be used.

name.label: Credential name
name.hint: Will be seen as credential name by all parties

url.label: Document URL
url.hint: Location of the document in the internet

version.label: Version
version.hint: Human and computer readable document version

error.pattern: Wrong version format use numbers, letters dots and minuses

authorId.label: Author ID
authorId.hint: ID sequence of the author. Can be a DID of identity.

documentHash.label: Contol sequence
documentHash.hint: Is used to verify the signature of the document

identity.hint: Click here to choose identity to sign the document
identity.noItems: There is no identity to sign documents
identity.pleaseSelect: No identity selected, click to select one

creationDate.label: Creation date
creationDate.hint: Date when the document was changed the last time
